(2,): As a user, I want to create a submission (FABS or DABS), so that I can submit my data for processing As a user, I want to update the publish status of my submission, so that I can track its progress As a user, I want to add errors to my submission, so that I can identify issues during validation As a user, I want to validate my FABS submission, so that I can ensure it meets requirements before publishing As a user, I want to validate my DABS submission, so that I can ensure it meets requirements before publishing As a system administrator, I want to process deletions of failed submissions, so that I can clean up outdated records As a system administrator, I want to add an agency, so that I can manage agency-specific submissions As a DevOps engineer, I want to configure New Relic, so that I can monitor application performance
